name: Kenneth John Odle
body:
## Hello World!

I work mainly with WordPress, creating plugins and themes. You can [view my WordPress.org profile](https://profiles.wordpress.org/kjodle/) to see what I've published so far, or [visit me on github](http://github.com/kjodle) to see the latest versions of those items, plus items I have not yet submitted to the official WordPress repository.

I also create things for [GetSimple](http://get-simple.info), although it's been a while.

When I have spare time, I love working with MediaWiki and Moodle.

### Support or Contact
You can [follow me on Twitter](https://twitter.com/iswpw) or [visit my contact page](http://kjodle.info/contant) to send me an email.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
